name: styletf
title: Style.tf
description:
A webapp that calculates and displays in-depth statistics from the game Team Fortress 2!
Style.tf uses the MongoDB Aggregation Pipeline extensively, and runs on a microservice architecture.
The project is currently analysing the weapon usage data of over 800,000 players.
writeup:
A webapp that calculates and displays in-depth statistics from the game Team Fortress 2!
Style.tf uses the MongoDB Aggregation Pipeline extensively, and runs on a microservice architecture.
The project is currently analysing the weapon usage data of over 800,000 players.
